message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you this great product for $145. Let me know if you're interested!
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100 for the product. I believe it's a fair price considering my budget.
Hi Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but the lowest I can go is $135 for this product. It's a great deal considering its value. Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, I appreciate you coming down to $135, but I'm still a bit short of my budget. I can offer $115 for the product. It's a reasonable price, and I'm willing to make a deal today.
Hi Bob, I see you're trying to work within your budget. I can meet you halfway at $125. This is the best I can do while still valuing the product appropriately. Let me know if this works for you!
